PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Luxury Swiss watches known for precision, waterproofness, and durability. Crafted in-house using 904L steel and precious metals. Collections range from elegant classics to professional models for diving and racing.
BRAND_VALUES: Excellence, performance, and sustainability, stemming from long-term vision and commitment to craftsmanship.
VALUE_PROPOSITION: Exceptional quality, precision, and reliability, combined with a symbol of achievement and exclusivity.
BRAND_PERSONALITY: Sophisticated, prestigious, reliable, timeless, embodying achievement
UNIQUE_SELLING_POINT: Symbol of success backed by precision and durability that lasts generations.
TARGET_AUDIENCE: Affluent individuals, successful professionals, and luxury watch collectors who value prestige and craftsmanship.
CREATIVE_DIRECTION: Redemption, father-son, corporate setting, watch as legacy
